sentiment_classifier.config package

Submodules

sentiment_classifier.config.default_config module

Default configuration used to control the ML training pipeline ETL/DAG.

sentiment_classifier.config.default_config.AUDIO_LIMIT = 110250

Blessed audio length limit applied to all processed audio

sentiment_classifier.config.default_config.CHROMA_WINDOW_LENGTH = 32

Blessed window length when computing Chroma features

sentiment_classifier.config.default_config.DAG_CONFIG = {'bayes_search': {'cv': 3, 'n_iter': 1, 'n_jobs': -1, 'n_points': 1, 'refit': True, 'scoring': 'f1_weighted', 'search_spaces': {'model__colsample_bytree': Real(low=0.92, high=0.999, prior='uniform', transform='identity'), 'model__learning_rate': Real(low=0.1, high=0.9, prior='log-uniform', transform='identity'), 'model__max_depth': Integer(low=10, high=28, prior='uniform', transform='identity'), 'model__min_child_samples': Integer(low=30, high=50, prior='uniform', transform='identity'), 'model__min_child_weight': Real(low=1e-06, high=0.0001, prior='log-uniform', transform='identity'), 'model__n_estimators': Integer(low=300, high=400, prior='uniform', transform='identity'), 'model__num_leaves': Integer(low=90, high=100, prior='uniform', transform='identity'), 'model__subsample': Real(low=0.94, high=0.98, prior='uniform', transform='identity')}, 'verbose': 0}, 'decomposition': {'n_components': 50, 'random_state': 0}, 'extract': {'audio_limit': 110250, 'chroma_window_length': 32, 'mel_window_length': 8, 'mfcc_window_length': 512, 'n_chroma': 12, 'n_mels': 128, 'n_mfcc': 20}, 'model': {'boosting_type': 'dart', 'class_weight': 'balanced', 'colsample_bytree': 0.95, 'learning_rate': 0.5, 'max_depth': 14, 'metric': 'binary_logloss', 'min_child_samples': 30, 'min_child_weight': 1e-05, 'min_split_gain': 0, 'n_estimators': 320, 'n_jobs': -1, 'num_leaves': 95, 'objective': 'binary', 'random_state': 0, 'reg_alpha': 0, 'reg_lambda': 0, 'subsample': 0.97175, 'subsample_freq': 2}, 'oversample': {'n_jobs': -1, 'random_state': 0}, 'random_state': 0, 'standardize': {'output_distribution': 'normal', 'random_state': 0}, 'test_size': 0.2}

Default configuration for the ML pipeline DAG that runs to train the model.

sentiment_classifier.config.default_config.MEL_WINDOW_LENGTH = 8

Blessed window length when computing melspectrogram

sentiment_classifier.config.default_config.MFCC_WINDOW_LENGTH = 512

Blessed window length when computing MFCC features

sentiment_classifier.config.default_config.N_CHROMA = 12

Number of chroma coefficients computed

sentiment_classifier.config.default_config.N_JOBS = -1

Tell sklearn et al to use all available cores to parallelize processing

sentiment_classifier.config.default_config.N_MELS = 128

Number of melspectrogram frequencies computed

sentiment_classifier.config.default_config.N_MFCC = 20

Number of MFCC coefficients computed

sentiment_classifier.config.default_config.RANDOM_STATE = 0

Random seed used throughout ML pipeline
